alert.note: Alert for Maverick (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 28 at 4:14PM CDT until April 28 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Maverick County in south central Texas... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 414 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Eagle Pass, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eagle Pass, Chula Vista, Rosita, Siesta Acres, Eidson Road, Fabrica, Farias Lake, Las Quintas Fronterizas, Seco Mines and Elm Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
